name: Banish
storyline:
BANISH is a Single and Co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. As a Priest, you are sent by the local church to a failed exorcism attempt in the Luxford Mansion. The Church Mission is about Mrs. Margaret Luxford who disappeared from social life after the unexplained suicide from her Husband.

Find out what happened with the Exorcism attempt, finish the Process, and try to stay alive if possible...
summary: BANISH is a Single and Co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. As a Priest, you are sent by the local church to a failed exorcism attempt in the Luxford Mansion. Fear, Panic, and Horror awaits you...
